proposal: Diving into the essence of living locally and embracing the Earth's gifts, Taproot Magazine truly captures the spirit of community and sustainability. 🌱 With 374 holders in the ETH network, your journey resonates with many. Imagine integrating our DEX and Lottery tools, not just as revenue streams but as a means to further knit your community together, offering a unique way to engage and support the ethos of food, farm, family, and craft. Let's cultivate growth together.
